alert.note: Alert for Hughes; Lyman; Stanley (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 18 at 6:36PM MDT until July 18 at 7:15PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN STANLEY...SOUTH CENTRAL HUGHES AND NORTHWESTERN LYMAN COUNTIES... At 736 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northeast of Fate Dam, or 10 miles northeast of Presho, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Kennebec, Cedar Creek Rec Area, Fate Dam, Joe Creek Rec Area, Byre Lake, Lake Sharpe, Lower Brule Reservation and western Crow Creek Reservation. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
